#  BOT Pin Analog
<!--
@name:  BOT Pin Analog
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Obtains the voltage at the specified pin
## Parameters

- **port**: The number of the port where the pin is located, 1, 2
